channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【We’ll fly you to Atlanta, Texas, and getting to your hotel in Atlanta, Georgia is your problem】我们将带您去德克萨斯州亚特兰大，到达佐治亚州亚特兰大的酒店是您的问题
item.description: 【Reading the fine print.】阅读精美的印刷品。

item.title: 【Announcing the winners of the 2025 Powerful Devs Hack Together】宣布2025年强大的开发人员的获奖者一起攻击
item.description: 【The 2025 Powerful Devs Hack Together brought developers together to build secure and scalable AI-powered solutions using Power Platform, Azure, AI Builder, and more. If you missed the event, you can still catch up on all the sessions covering AI, automation, security, extensibility, and more! 🎥 Watch here: aka.ms/powerfuldevs/ondemand Technologies Used in the Hackathon We […]】2025年功能强大的开发人员将开发人员聚集在一起，使用电源平台，Azure，AI Builder等建造安全可扩展的AI驱动解决方案。如果您错过了活动，您仍然可以赶上所有涵盖AI，自动化，安全性，可扩展性等的会话！ 🎥在这里观看：aka.ms/poperfuldevs/ondemand Technologies We […]

item.title: 【VS Code C++ Extension Updates: 4x Faster Colorization & 3.5x Faster Project Startup】VS代码C ++扩展更新：4倍更快的着色速度和3.5倍更快的项目启动
item.description: 【In the latest releases of the C++ Extension in Visual Studio Code, we have focused on performance improvements and stability. A fast, responsive, and reliable development environment is essential for maintaining productivity, especially in large and complex C++ projects. These updates include many incremental optimizations that collectively speed up the time from opening a C++ […]】在Visual Studio代码中C ++扩展的最新版本中，我们专注于绩效改进和稳定性。快速，响应迅速且可靠的开发环境对于维持生产力至关重要，尤其是在大型和复杂的C ++项目中。这些更新包括许多增量优化，这些优化共同加快了打开C ++的时间[…]

item.title: 【Boost Your CMake Development with Copilot Custom Instructions】使用Copilot自定义说明增强您的CMAKE开发
item.description: 【Introduction Creating a new CMake project that uses unfamiliar libraries can be daunting and time-consuming. This blog post takes you along on my journey using Copilot to make this easier, and leveraging Custom Instructions to tailor Copilot responses. For a sneak peek, see the outcome of this journey in this repository. Background As C++ developers […]】引言创建一个新的CMAKE项目，该项目使用不熟悉的库可能令人生畏和耗时。这篇博客文章将带您使用Copilot的旅程，以使这一更轻松，并利用自定义说明来定制Copilot响应。要偷看，请参阅此存储库中的这一旅程的结果。背景为C ++开发人员[…]

item.title: 【Exploring new .NET releases with Dev Containers】使用开发容器探索新的.NET版本
item.description: 【Learn how to set up and use dev containers for experimenting with new .NET releases.】了解如何设置和使用开发容器来尝试新的.NET版本。

item.title: 【Why does INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE cast through a LONG_PTR first?】为什么Invalid_handle_value首先通过long_ptr施放？
item.description: 【To ensure that the proper sign extension happens.】确保发生适当的符号扩展。

item.title: 【New Overlapping Secrets on Azure DevOps OAuth】Azure Devops Oauth上的新重叠秘密
item.description: 【As you may have read, Azure DevOps OAuth apps are due for deprecation in 2026. All developers are encouraged to migrate their applications to use Microsoft Entra ID OAuth, which can access all Azure DevOps APIs and has the added benefit of enhanced security features and long-term investment. Although we are nearing Azure DevOps OAuth’s […]】您可能已经阅读了，Azure Devops Oauth应用程序应在2026年进行弃用。鼓励所有开发人员迁移其应用程序使用Microsoft Entra ID Oauth，该应用程序可以访问所有Azure DevOps API，并具有增强的安全功能和长期投资的额外好处。尽管我们正在接近Azure Devops Oauth的[…]

item.title: 【Debugging with the AI-powered IEnumerable visualizer】与AI驱动的Ienumerable可视化器调试
item.description: 【Are you tired of wrestling with complex LINQ queries during debugging? Visual Studio 2022 has introduced powerful new improvement, powered by AI, to simplify your workflow with its editable expression feature in the IEnumerable Visualizer. These added functionalities aim to make debugging more intuitive and efficient, helping you write and refine LINQ queries with ease. […]】您是否厌倦了在调试期间与复杂的Linq查询搏斗？ Visual Studio 2022引入了由AI提供支持的强大的新改进，以简化您的工作流程，并在Ienumerable Visualize中使用其可编辑的表达功能。这些附加功能旨在使调试更加直观和高效，从而帮助您轻松编写和完善Linq查询。 […]

item.title: 【Use BrowserStack App Automate with Appium UI Tests for .NET MAUI Apps】使用.NET MAUI应用程序的Appium UI测试使用Browserstack应用程序自动化
item.description: 【In this post, learn how to run your Appium UI Tests for .NET MAUI Apps on real devices on the cloud using BrowserStack App Automate.】在这篇文章中，了解如何使用Browserstack App Automate在云上的真实设备上对.NET MAUI应用程序运行Appium UI测试。

item.title: 【Improve performance and security using Standard Load Balancer and Standard SKU public IP addresses in Azure DevTest Labs】使用标准负载平衡器和Azure DevTest实验室中的标准负载平衡器和标准SKU公共IP地址提高性能和安全性
item.description: 【We are excited to announce preview of enhancements in Azure DevTest Labs designed to accommodate two upcoming retirements in Azure: Retirement Date Details Azure Basic Load Balancer September 30, 2025 The Azure Basic Load Balancer will be retired. You can continue using your existing Basic Load Balancers until this date, but you will not be […]】我们很高兴地宣布预览Azure DevTest Labs中的增强功能，旨在容纳Azure的两个即将到来的退休：退休日期详细介绍了Azure Basic Load Balancer，2025年9月30日，Azure Basical Load Balancer将退休。您可以在此日期之前继续使用现有的基本负载平衡器，但是您不会[…]
